name: evolve-simulation
description: A dynamic framework for simulating evolving environments and intelligent interactions
author: Core Contributor

comments.dev: Runs the app in development mode with live reload
comments.build: Compiles TypeScript into JavaScript in the dist directory
comments.interactions:add: Adds new interactions to the simulation environment
comments.city:initiate: Sets up the initial simulation city environment
comments.chat:random: Initiates a chat with a random citizen from the simulation
